sentences.english: Free bags, even under other  guises, would be banned.
sentences.chinese: 只要是免費塑料袋，不論以何形式提供都予以禁止。

sentences.english: They're perfect for closing open plastic bags, such as rice bags.
sentences.chinese: 它們也是修復塑料袋開口的完美選擇，比如米袋。

sentences.english: All the cartons are lined with plastic sheets， so they're absolutely water-proof， I can assure you.
sentences.chinese: 所有紙箱都內襯塑料袋，我可以保證絕對防水。

sentences.english: We fix it, pierce in several places and put into the oven.
sentences.chinese: 將塑料袋封好，然後在上面搓幾處小孔，放入烤箱。

sentences.english: In this aspect, I think, pater bags have the edge on plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲在這方面紙袋要比塑料袋強一點兒。

sentences.english: No, though even here, the growers put plastic bags around the bunches to protect them and keep them warm.
sentences.chinese: 不，甚至在這種植者用塑料袋圍住香蕉樹使它們包暖。

sentences.english: Researchers advise reallocating snack foods into small plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員建議將零食用小塑料袋分開包裝。

sentences.english: He is scared of the sound of plastic bags crumpling .
sentences.chinese: 它很害怕揉搓塑料袋發出的悉悉索索的聲音。

sentences.english: Wrap each blob in plastic wrap and refrigerate.
sentences.chinese: 將每份雜糧團用塑料袋包裝並放入冰箱冷藏。

sentences.english: Then they would make a clamor, or throw in a burning plastic bag.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們會大聲嚷嚷，或者扔一個點着的塑料袋進去。

sentences.english: Second, we had best not use plastic bags which can bring about the white pollution.
sentences.chinese: 第二，我們最好不要使用塑料袋會導致白色污染。

sentences.english: It depressed me to pick it all up and put it into yet another plastic bag.
sentences.chinese: 把它們一一撿起再放入另一個塑料袋讓我很是反感。

sentences.english: Initially, it costs the consumer nothing to throw away a plastic bag.
sentences.chinese: 起初，消費者隨意的扔棄一個塑料袋都不以爲然。

sentences.english: Use plain brown grocery bags and craft-like paints to make your design.
sentences.chinese: 使用純棕色的塑料袋和繪畫顏料開始設計。

sentences.english: Boots made of recycled plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 可回收塑料袋製作的靴子。

sentences.english: I have installed two sesame seed holding a small plastic bag while and enjoy the scenery while strolling.
sentences.chinese: 我拿着裝了兩個燒餅的小塑料袋邊觀賞美景邊溜達。

definition: pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
rubbish bin/trash can/garbage can/Taiwan pr. [le4 se4 tong3]
